name: ONKAN
description:
Onkan is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the Aztecs, where sacrifices must be made. The game has eighteen levels set within two pyramids. The first nine levels take place in a right-side-up pyramid while the last nine levels are in an upside-down pyramid. Each Level is themed to a God that chronologically appears in one of the Aztec Creation Myths.

What's Included in the Demo

Currently, the demo allows players to test and provide feedback for character movement, interacting with sacrifices, altars, pillars, pushable pillars, stairs and air elevators. This will be on the 4 levels in the game at the moment with more levels up to 9 to come down the road.

How to Play

Explore through the levels bringing sacrifices to altars to unlock the next steps.

Feedback

This is an ongoing project and any feedback would be great! Please fill out this form from the link provided! Thank you for playing ONKAN.

https://forms.gle/NVRue6ZYztq9EsEY7

Controls

W A S D to move

Q and E to rotate the camera

Space to Jump

F to interact with altars and sacrifices

ESC to pause the game
